Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Riverdell Way and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way, running north and south, intersects Netherworld Lane, running east and west, at this point. Both roads literally span the city in the directions that they are heading. Netherworld runs through the center of town, passing by the northern border and main entrance to the Necropolis. Riverdell runs south past the Allakaren Circle and Pyramid, towards the southern City Wall.
